message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, I'll give you a small share!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
You're getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm getting close to taking it all, don't make me do that!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'll give you almost all of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
